item.description:
As a native Bostonian, I love our rich history and hearing stories about the Back Bay and how they filled the water in to make a place for  the streets now called Copley, Dartmouth, Exeter.  What about the fabulous residences on Commonweath Avenue, ever wonder about those families, what their lives were like in the early 20th Century?  The Mass Historical Society can bring us back to that time..........

 

I've arranged for our very own docent to provide us with an art/building tour from 10 to 11:30a.  Here's their website if you'd like to take a look. www.masshist.org

Following the tour, we will head over to The Mission Bar and Grille at 724 Huntington Ave for brunch.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Boston History Buffs - Tour Mass Historical Society
